overview: There are married couples, engaged couples and couples who are in lust, but there's nothing better than having a friend with benefits no hang ups, no expectations. A kiss and cuddle on the sofa is always a green light for a serious fuck session. Saving water by showering with a pal doesn't stop at soaping each other's backs and a kick-around in the park sees two best pals scoring with each other once they get home. Fucking Friends are the best a man can have, especially when they love it bareback.
title: Wet Pussy Lickers
